attributes.action: Eric pickles must resign immediately over he's  discrimination against gypsy and travellers and stop the lthe law that say your onky
attributes.additional_details: We call for the immediate resignation of Eric pickles for he's blaten discrimination against gypsy/travellers in planning and for creating the ridiculous law that say a gypsy must prove the have a normadic lifestyle, it shouldn't be up to the government to decide & define who & what people are that's taking away every human right & robbing away their identity right under their noses if you live in a house or trailer/caravan  it doesn't matter we are who we are & that's it the same as every other ethnic race, it is not where we live that defines us its what's in the blood that counts.
